objects.text:
Elegant Retro-Style With Powerful Twin Bells
Compact Size Perfect For Nightstands
Clear Analog Display With Large Numbers
Silent No-Tick Operation For Peaceful Sleep

product_details.name: Classic Mini Twin-Bell Alarm Clock - Vintage Style Modern Reliability
product_details.description:
• Elegant white retro-style design with twin bells for powerful wake-up call
• Compact size perfect for nightstands and travel (approx. 4 inches tall)
• Clear analog display with large numbers for easy reading
• Traditional mechanical bell sound for authentic alarm experience
• Durable plastic construction with metallic finish
• Battery-operated for reliable timekeeping (batteries not included)
• No-tick quiet operation for peaceful sleep
• Simple to set alarm mechanism
• Lightweight and portable design
• Perfect blend of classic charm and modern functionality

banner_details:
This banner features a vintage-themed product advertisement, centered around a classic analog alarm clock. The design uses a soft cream background with geometric and wavy border lines to frame the central content. The headline labeled as `heading` is bold and prominent at the top, using a vintage slab serif font in a deep navy blue. Below that, the `subheading` introduces the style with a modern bold sans-serif font. The `description` block provides a concise, feature-rich product overview in a clean, legible typeface. Bottom left includes the `price` tag in bold, and a contrasting `cta_button` with the `cta` label encourages user action. A realistic image of the clock (`product_image`) is presented on the right side for visual appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream White: `#F2F0EA` (Background)
- Deep Navy Blue: `#2D4356` (Text, accents, button)
- Slate Blue: `#435B66` (Subheading)
- Charcoal Gray: `#4C5964` (Body text)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (Button text)
product_color: The product image features a vintage-style white alarm clock with a minimalistic yet eye-catching color palette. Dominated by clean, crisp white (#FFFFFF), the clock has smooth silver-gray shadows and accents (#D3D3D3) to add depth and realism. The bold black numbers and clock hands (#000000) contrast sharply against the white face, ensuring visibility and visual balance. Slight hints of soft blue tones (#C0D6E4) subtly reflect around metallic edges, creating a cool undertone that enhances its sleek appearance. The color blending is gentle and harmonious, allowing each element to stand out while forming a cohesive, polished look ideal for a clean and modern advertisement banner.
